name: Pixel
description: Pixel is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box and retro console buttons, Pixel stands out among other robots. Its arms and legs resemble that of a cat, giving it a playful and agile appearance. The classic screen adds a touch of nostalgia to its design, while the glasses add a hint of sophistication. With a perfect blend of vintage and modern elements, Pixel is ready to explore the digital world with its impressive abilities.
